title: The Next Chapter
description: The Next Chapter is the story of a solid marriage of love, happiness and fulfillment; until that fateful day when it is ripped apart by a terrible automobile accident. Carol Davison is left torn apart, grieving for that which will never be again. How will she survive? How does she move forward? How does she turn the page in "The Next Chapter" of her life?
author: Melanie  Young
